attributes.action: Stop a Carlisle resident mother of two from being deported to the Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details:
The link below explains Nadiya's situation, which was published in the News and Star.

http://tinyurl.com/o8snend

Please sign the petition so that Nadiya is not separated from her family and forced to spend Christmas in the war stricken Ukraine.

Remember, Nadiya's situation is due to an unexplained formality from the home office, and this petition could help further injustice affecting those in other communities.
attributes.background: Nadiya McWhirter is a Ukrainian mother of 2 British children and wife to a British husband. Nadiya has been threatened with deportation to the Ukraine, currently a dangerous environment, with no explanation (please read the new paper article in more information). She has lived in the UK for 8 years.
